mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.deleted,a.creator,a.modifier,a.create_time, a.modify_time,a.author_id,a.title,a.images,a.content, a.classify,a.mode,a.read_count, ru.article_id > 0 as `isLike` FROM `article` a LEFT JOIN `r_user_like_article` ru ON a.id = ru.article_id and ru.user_id = #{userId} WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.deleted = 0

SELECT a.*, ru.article_id > 0 as `isLike` FROM `article` a LEFT JOIN `r_user_like_article` ru ON a.id = ru.article_id and ru.user_id = #{userId}
AND a.deleted = 0 AND ( a.title like "%"#{search}"%" OR a.content like "%"#{search}"%" OR a.classify like "%"#{search}"%")
